sentence.Network_en: "I wish I had a little brother," said Daphne wistfully.
sentence.Network_cn: “我希望有个小弟弟。”达夫妮伤感地说。

sentence.Network_en: " If only I had known you then, " he said wistfully.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 要是我那时候认识你就好了, ” 他伤感地说.

sentence.Network_en: He looked wistfully on the velvet carpet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他如饥似渴地欣赏着丝绒地毯.

list.abs: I hear them adding wistfully ,, 我听到他们若有所思地说,

an aged farmer and his wife were leaning against the edge of their pig-penwhen the old woman wistfully recalled that the next week would mark their golden wedding anniversary .一位上了年纪的农民和他的妻子面对面斜考在猪圈的边上。这位老妇女希望能在下个星期为他们的金婚纪念日做些什么。
the new Lilli was the girl left behind , waiting wistfully for her soldier to return safely .新的丽莉是一个留在后方、苦苦期待她的心上人平安归来的姑娘。
follow unswervingly 忠实地跟随follow wistfully 令人渴望地从事follow out 查阅,贯彻,彻底实行,把…追究到底.

entry.tran: (因求而不得)失意的，伤感的，惆怅的
entry.def: Someone who is wistful is rather sad because they want something and know that they cannot have it.

example.ex: I can't help feeling slightly wistful about the perks I'm giving up...
example.tran: 我不禁对自己将要放弃的津贴感到有点儿不舍。

sentences.sentence: "his sister would have looked beautiful in that dress, he thought wistfully, just like an angel"

auth_sentence.content: My own particular favorite Spain faded out wistfully.

auth_sentence.content: Fine smooth cotton, rather wistfully shaped.

auth_sentence.content: I was so beautiful in those days, she said wistfully.
